languages.text:
"В таком случае... позвольте и мне откланяться".
{n}Сохраняя учтиво-отчужденное выражение, Кассия коротко кивает и покидает комнату.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"В таком случае... позвольте и мне откланяться".
{n}Сохраняя учтиво-отчужденное выражение, Кассия коротко кивает и покидает комнату.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"В таком случае... позвольте и мне откланяться".
{n}Сохраняя учтиво-отчужденное выражение, Кассия коротко кивает и покидает комнату.{/n}

{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}

"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text:
"Wenn dem so ist ... gestattet mir bitte, mich ebenfalls zu entschuldigen."
{n}Cassia nickt dir mit höflich distanzierter Miene knapp zu und verlässt den Raum.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Wenn dem so ist ... gestattet mir bitte, mich ebenfalls zu entschuldigen."
{n}Cassia nickt dir mit höflich distanzierter Miene knapp zu und verlässt den Raum.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text:
« Dans ce cas, je vous prie de m'excuser également. »
{n}Avec un air distant et poli, Cassia hoche rapidement la tête avant de quitter la pièce.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
« Dans ce cas, je vous prie de m'excuser également. »
{n}Avec un air distant et poli, Cassia hoche rapidement la tête avant de quitter la pièce.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此……我也失陪了。”{n}卡西娅冷淡而不失礼貌地点了点头，离开了房间。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此……我也失陪了。”{n}卡西娅冷淡而不失礼貌地点了点头，离开了房间。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text:
「もしもそうなら…どうかあたくしもお暇させてください」
{n}礼儀正しいよそよそしさを感じさせる表情で、カシアはあなたに短く会釈すると、部屋を出る。.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
「もしもそうなら…どうかあたくしもお暇させてください」
{n}礼儀正しいよそよそしさを感じさせる表情で、カシアはあなたに短く会釈すると、部屋を出る。.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text:
«Si es así... permítame que yo también me disculpe, por favor».
{n}Con educación, Cassia inclina la cabeza de manera cortante y se va de la habitación.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}

{n}Con educación, Cassia inclina la cabeza de manera cortante y se va de la habitación.{/n}

languages.original_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}

languages.text: "Madem öyle ben de müsaadeni isteyeyim." {n}Cassia, yüzünde nazik ancak bir o kadar da mesafeli bir ifadeyle başını kısaca sallıyor ve odadan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If so... please allow me to excuse myself as well."
{n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod and leaves the room.{/n}
